Posts.Content: Sep 23, 2013 02:56PM TAR423 wrote: I had mine done Thursday 9/19 - I'm at my desk as we speak but my question is this.....can I go for a slow walk this evening - seems I've been home "resting" and doing nothing but eating - I really do not want to gain anymore wieght and would actually like to lose some - any advice on losing???? I'm tired of being tired so I'm hoping my ooph was the answer to stop my vag bleeding of 3 weeks on - 2 days off....
